dict.string: Searching for Players
Your location service is switched off. Please turn it on.
Unable to access location. Enable location access.
Failed to access location. Reason: %s
Unexpected error. Reason: %s
Server communication failure. Try again.
Room no longer active. Returning to room selection.
Unable to start battle Player left the room. Returning to previous screen.
Failed to communicate with server.
Connecting to room. Stable connection required.
Accessing location. Stable connection required.
Accessing data from host. Stable connection required.
Connection slow to respond. Communication may be disrupted during battle.
You don't have the necessary stamina to join this quest.
Event is not available. Choose another quest.
Unable to join quest. Choose another quest.
Event is not available. Choose another quest.
Event is not available. Choose another quest.
Unit Folder full. Clear space by enhancing or selling units.
Failed to access location. Stable connection required.
Connection lost due to idle communication.
Connection lost due to communication timeout.
Cannot move directly between rooms. Leave current room to try again.
Host not responding. Returning to room selection.
Room is full or no longer active. Choose another room.
Please leave current room before moving to another room.
Play limit reached. Room will be closed.
